tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor for grand mother's treatment. She has paralysis background and visited as she was suffering from anxiety and headache issues. 1) Office staff especially receptionist is very rude talking to patients.2) No enough chairs atleast to accommodate patients.3) Delay in doing lab tests and producing lab reports.4) They do not have a staff member atleast to make an injection. ** * ***** ** ***** ** **** *** **** ***** ** ********* *** *** **** ******6) They cant even provide a proper file to accomodate prescriptions and reports. 7) Only good thing is though in this covid situation doctor touches the patient and doing analysis8) But doctor is not so clear in explaining the actual problems in detail.** **** ****** ********** ******** ** *********** ** ****** ***** ** *** *********** Overall my experience is so bad.
reply_text:
Dear friend, I think you mistook our Covid 19 precautions as our service limitation.   

1)Few attendents who accompanied your patient insisted on occupying the patient's chairs for which our staff requested them to sit in outside chairs due to fear of the premises getting overcrowded . Nothing personal. Sorry for the inconvenience.

2)You might have observed that we had blocked half of our waiting chairs to maintain social distance. 

3)We can't cut down the lab processing time just because you want it quickly. It may alter the test results.

4)We are not offering files to ensure minimal person to person and person to surface contacts.

5)We are offering injections only for emergency cases due to Covid crisis.

6)I made every effort to examine your patient  knowing that I am at risk of getting infected. However my face mask and face shield might had obstructed my communication.

 The risks and experiences which health care personnel and their families are facing due to Covid are far more worse than many experiences.

review: We have been goin to this hospital from past 3 months.Manor disadvantages1. Doctor will not talk to patient, most of the time he looks at monitor. Sir, half of the problem will be solved by your words.2. Receptionists behaves not good. They always says they are busy, brother and sister it's your duty and your are paid it.
reply_text:
Dear friend,
Thanks for acknowledging that my words have healing power. My data entry employee went on emergency leave that day and I had to manage the computer along with the patient treatment. Unfortunately you forgot all our past 3 months healthy interactions and remembered that busy day experience.
The same issue might have reflected on waiting time of the patients and made our from office staff busy.
I request you to be considerate and think from our side.
Thank you
Dr Neehar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: completely satisfied with the treatment but wait time is more even though we took an appointment for specific time slot need to wait more time. Present situation spending more time in hospital is not good what I feel they need to work out on wait time and find proper solution
reply_text: Sorry for the inconvenience. The present situation is the cause of the wait time. 30 percent of our time is being allocated for hand sanitisation, changing gloves,  careful examination avoiding close contact.  However we have kept separate area for waiting of attendents and restricted in clinic waiting chairs to 50 percent capacity. We had reduce the staff also to 50 percent to avoid risk of infection. If performing the lab  procedures with PPE wearing kits has reduced the pace of performance. We are restricting  suspected patients entry into premises and the doctor himself goes out to see them. All these are causing a lot of hurdle in our performance. We request you to cooperate with our efforts.. Our efforts are always to make our premises infection free. We sometimes recommend some high senior citizens to stay back in their vehicles and ask them to come just before consultation. Thank you for bearing with us. Namaste
